Terms and Conditions 

 These terms and conditions govern your use of SCRAPS. By accessing or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, you may not use the App. 

 1. Acceptance of Terms 

 By downloading, installing, or using SCRAPS, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the App. 

 2. User Accounts 

 a. You may need to create an account to access certain features of SCRAPS. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. 

 b. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete. 

 3. Use of the App 

 a. You agree to use SCRAPS only for lawful purposes and in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. 

 b. You may not: 

 Use SCRAPS in any way that could damage, disable, overburden. Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of SCRAPS, accounts, or networks connected to SCRAPS. Use SCRAPS to transmit any viruses, worms, defects, Trojan horses, or other malicious code. 

4. Intellectual Property 

 a. All content, features, and functionality of SCRAPS, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, audio, video, and software, are the property of the Company or its licensors and are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. 

 b. You may not modify, reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works based on any part of SCRAPS without the express written consent of the Company. 

 5. Privacy 

 a. Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you. 

 6. Termination 

 a. The Company may terminate or suspend your access to SCRAPS at any time, with or without cause, and without prior notice. 

 7. Disclaimer of Warranties 

 a. SCRAPS IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, THE COMPANY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT OF INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS. 

 8. Limitation of Liability 

 a. TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COMPANY BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO DAMAGES FOR LOST PROFITS, LOSS OF DATA, LOSS OF USE, OR INTERRUPTION OF BUSINESS, ARISING OUT OF OR IN ANY WAY RELATED TO YOUR USE OF OR INABILITY TO USE SCRAPS. 

 9. Governing Law 

 a. These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of United Kingdom, without regard to its conflicts of law provisions. 

 10. Changes to Terms 

 a. The Company reserves the right to update or modify these Terms at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of SCRAPS after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
